import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Paper } from '@material-ui/core' import Posts from '../Post/posts' import FormElements from '../Form/forms' import getPost from '../../REDUX/action/action' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import Intro from './Intro' import Navbar from "../Nav Panel/Navbar" import PaginationContainer from '../Paginator/Pagination' const MainComponents = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const dispatch = useDispatch(); //MAKES DISPATCHING WHERE IT CAN DISPLAY OUR DATA ON THE SCREEN // IT WILL WORK ONLY WHEN THE DISPATCH METHOD WORKS useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPost()) },[currentId, dispatch]) return (
) } export default MainComponents
